title: Redesigning Web-Based Patient Assessment Training Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and patient record documentation methods
context.additional_context: Online Learning Environment Using Digital Devices, Emphasizing Collaborative Activities with Peers

learning_goals: Learners achieve ≥85% proficiency in patient symptom analysis via web-based self-assessment.
Learners complete patient assessment reports (SOAP notes) with ≥90% accuracy using peer collaboration worksheets.
Learners improve patient medication information analysis competency by ≥70% in formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
